content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: beacon
inventory=[{"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 56, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a beacon, I need to place 3 obsidian blocks in the bottom row of the crafting table, 5 glass blocks in the middle row, and 1 nether star in the top middle slot. Since I already have 3 obsidian blocks and 1 nether star, I will first move 1 glass block to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: beacon
inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "purple_carpet", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 56, "index": 43}]
thought: I now need to move 4 more glass blocks to the middle row of the crafting table. I will move the next glass block to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
